original_text: They took the young men to grind, and the children fell under the wood.
korean_text: 청년들이 맷돌을 지며 아이들이 나무를 지다가 엎드러지오며

sentences.original_text: They took the young men to grind
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 젊은 남자들을 끌고 가서 맷돌을 갈게 했다

sentences.original_text: and the children fell under the wood
